title: Lead Developers till HSB
description:
**Är du en utvecklare som vägrar släppa taget om kodandet?** 




 Hos oss får du deploya kod som gör skillnad – och känna att det är balsam för själen.
 



  





**Trött på att inveckla istället för utveckla?** 




 Vi bygger lösningar som är smarta, hållbara och begripliga – så att någon kan ta över och bygga vidare på det du varit med och skapat.
 



  





**Vill du jobba tätt med riktigt duktiga utvecklare?** 




 Du blir en del av ett team med tre Lead Devs och ett 30-tal skickliga och trevliga utvecklarkonsulter – här lär vi av varandra och löser problem tillsammans.
 



  





**Tycker du att ledarskap handlar om att bana väg, inte om att sätta löner?** 




 Hos oss leder du genom att skapa mönster och inspirera, utan personalansvar eller administration.
 



  





**Vill du ha en trygg arbetsgivare med entreprenörsanda och en miljon kunder?** 




 HSB kombinerar långsiktighet med frihet – här finns plats för både innovation och balans i livet.
 



  





**Känner du igen dig? Då är det dags att läsa vidare!** 




 Vi söker fler Lead Developers som vill förbättra vardagen för HSBs medarbetare, boende och bostadsrättsföreningar.
 



  





**En dag på jobbet** 




 Som en del av den cirka 100 personer stora gänget Digitalisering & IT kommer du verka i något av våra prioriterade initiativ. Då vi endast har en handfull egna anställda utvecklare sker valet av hemvist under stor omtanke. Cirka 80% av din tid spenderar du här tillsammans med ditt team. När det ”prioriterade” är klart eller vi tillsammans känner att det är läge hittar vi ett nytt team. Gissningsvis blir cyklerna 6-24 månader men det får framtiden utvisa. Att rotera ibland är centralt både för att bygga din kompetens, sprida kompetens och skapa ett gemensamt arbetssätt.
 



  





 Utöver ditt bidrag ute i ett team kommer du spendera resterande tid tillsammans med ditt ”riktiga hem”, Tech och Arkitektur. Där diskuterar vi vilka gemensamma mönster vi bör staka ut samt säkrar att vi bygger tillräckligt homogent och systematiskt rör oss ur den legacy som oundvikligen alltid uppstår. Vi planerar också för gemensamma insatser och hackathons för att bygga en vi-känsla tvärs teamen.
 



  





 Våra Lead Developers som kommit in under året är redan kända för att kavla upp ärmarna och få saker gjorda – och är tydliga med att de inte har svaret på alla frågor. När det är dags att lägga ut en ny rutt är det ofta Lead Devs som går först och skapar mönster som vi sedan kan bygga vidare på.
 



  





**Vårt tekniska landskap** 




 Vi befinner oss mellan bank och startup i komplexitet.
 


* De flesta mikrotjänster är yngre än 10 år, skrivna i C#/.NET och driftade i Azure/Kubernetes (okej det finns lite VM:ar kvar också...).
* Vi förenklar kontinuerligt gränssnitten mellan tjänsterna och bygger HSB-APIs.
* Våra pipelines i Azure DevOps är på väg in i tredje generationen – enklare, snabbare, bättre.
* Några monolitiska affärssystem finns kvar i botten. Vi renodlar och flyttar dem successivt till molnet.



  





 Kort sagt: ett varierat smörgåsbord där det finns mycket att bidra till.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 



* 10+ års erfarenhet av systemutveckling, varav merparten i närheten av C#/.NET/Azure/Kubernetes, alternativt Javascript/Angular om du vill bli vår första Frontend Lead Dev
* Masterexamen eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Flytande i svenska och engelska



  





**Vad erbjuder vi?** 



* Många spännande möjligheter att välja bland – du styr själv din utveckling
* Ett litet, spetsigt team med hög teknisk kompetens och stor frihet under ansvar
* Möjlighet att påverka din egen och HSBs utveckling
* Nytt modernt kontor i Hagastaden, Stockholm - med gym cykelgarage och fina förmåner
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag och bra villkor
* En organisation som präglas av engagemang, trygghet, hållbarhet, omtanke och samverkan



  





**HSB Riksförbund** 




 HSB är Sveriges ledande bostadskooperation med fastighetsförvaltning och bostadsutveckling som kärnaffär. HSB Riksförbund ska stärka vår idé och skapa värde för HSB-föreningarna och dess medlemmar, utveckla HSBs gemensamma varumärke samt stärka HSBs roll i samhället. Hos oss får du stort eget ansvar, möjlighet att påverka och utvecklas, samt arbeta i en organisation med korta beslutsvägar och högt i tak. Vi erbjuder flexibla arbetsformer, goda anställningsvillkor och en kultur där vi värdesätter balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi befinner oss på en otroligt spännande resa där varje individ har en viktig roll – vill du vara med och göra skillnad? Sök tjänsten redan idag!
 



  





*Till bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag och till dig som är försäljare: Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.* 




  





 Intervjuer kommer att ske löpande, så skicka din ansökan redan nu!
 



  





 Vill du veta mer, kontakta Team Lead för Tech och Arkitektur, Johan Lengqvist, ext.johan.lengqvist@hsb.se, 070-602 46 03 eller HR, Frida Markell, frida.markell@hsb.se, 010-442 03 77

title: Senior Android Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 This is an exciting opportunity to work on interesting problems together with talented peers in a cross-functional agile team. You will create modern digital products that affect people’s lives for he better within PayPal globally. We’re the Seller Profile team at PayPal, dedicated to empowering solopreneurs and small business owners to grow their businesses through customer relationship workflows, ways to find new customers, intuitive tools, and relevant insights. Our mission is to help the merchants sell more. We work at scale, innovating products that serve millions globally and create huge lasting impacts on people’s lives. As an Agile cross-functional team, we place a strong focus on collaboration and delivering small, high-quality increments consistently. We welcome new team members wholeheartedly and provide tailored support for their learning and growth journeys.
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Essential Responsibilities:**
* Delivers complete solutions spanning all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) (design, implementation, testing, delivery and operations), based on definitions from more senior roles.
* Advises immediate management on project-level issues
* Guides junior engineers
* Operates with little day-to-day supervision, making technical decisions based on knowledge of internal conventions and industry best practices
* Applies knowledge of technical best practices in making decisions


**Expected Qualifications:**
* 3+ years relevant experience and a Bachelor’s degree OR Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


**Additional Responsibilities And Preferred Qualifications**
 In this role you will get the opportunity to work in a cross functional team with skilled and high preforming team to deliver a world class experience for our users. You will tap into their years of delivery experience to turbo boost your learning so that you can help deliver exciting features and improvements to the Seller profile experience at scale and across multiple Geolocations.
   

  

**Your day-to-day**
* You will focus on your learning while helping to deliver high quality solutions to our users.
* Collaborate with the team to define, design, and ship new features.
* You work closely with product to understand context and vision.
* You will learn and work with your peers in the Android chapter with improvements and increase learning opportunities for all in a supportive environment.
* You can bring your desire to innovate during and hack weeks and lab days on a bimonthly basis.


**What Do You Need To Bring**
* Solid experience in Android Development, with a strong command of Kotlin and the Android SDK.
* In-depth knowledge of Jetpack Compose and Android design and development patterns to create robust, scalable, and maintainable applications.
* A user-centered design mindset, aiming to create products that are intuitive to use and impactful for customers.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies, working collaboratively across the cross-functional team to deliver value in iterations.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills, with an eagerness to learn from team members, share your insights, and collaborate with stakeholders outside of the team.
* Proven expertise in automated testing to ensure high-quality code for production environments.


 PayPal does not charge candidates any fees for courses, applications, resume reviews, interviews, background checks, or onboarding. Any such request is a red flag and likely part of a scam. To learn more about how to identify and avoid recruitment fraud please visit https://careers.pypl.com/contact-us.
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset-you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0131643

title: Principal Database Programmer
description:
TFS HealthScience is a leading global mid-size Contract Research Organization (CRO) that partners with biotechnology and pharmaceutical companies throughout their entire clinical development journey. Our expertise includes full-service capabilities, resourcing, and Functional Service (FSP) solutions.
   

  

 We are currently looking for a Principal Database Programmer. This is a key role responsible for leading and executing database programming activities to support clinical studies, ensuring quality, compliance, and operational excellence.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Principal Database Programmer, you will work operationally on preparing, conducting, and completing clinical data management tasks on assigned study teams in accordance with company policies, SOPs, and regulatory requirements. You will provide technical leadership, mentor junior programmers, and contribute to the development of processes and standards that enhance data management at TFS.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Provide training and mentoring to (Senior) Database Programmers on CDMS systems and processes
* Plan client deliverables and manage project budgets
* Act as programming lead for assigned studies or programs
* Set up study databases and ePRO/IRT (if applicable) based on provided specifications
* Write or review the Database Validation Plan and perform database validation/UAT in collaboration with CDM
* Review Data Validation Plans for feasibility and program edit checks in CDM systems and/or SAS
* Support CDM with data import/export and creation of data transfer specifications, liaising with vendors as needed
* Validate data transfer programming and manage user access rights
* Provide user support for EDC studies and execute database locks with CDM
* Escalate project issues or SOP deviations as required
* Contribute to system validation, including test script creation and UAT execution
* Participate in process development, SOP writing/review, and related training
* Provide input to proposals that include data management components and attend bid defense meetings as needed


**Depending On Your Level Of Qualification, You May Also**
* Perform SAS programming related to data management outputs (e.g. data listings, SAE reconciliation, ad-hoc reports)
* Develop and validate global SAS macros for data management processes
* Program/validate SDTM datasets, including define.XML and SDTM reviewer’s guides
* Provide training and mentoring related to SAS programming


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Life Science, Computer Science, or a related field
* Minimum of 8 years of relevant database programming experience in the pharmaceutical or CRO industry, including at least 5 years at a senior level
* Familiarity with CDMS systems and industry standards applicable for programming in a GxP environment (e.g. 21 CFR Part 11, GAMP)
* Proven leadership skills and the ability to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Strong ability to work effectively with sponsors and internal teams


 What We Offer
   

  

 We provide opportunities for personal and professional growth in a rewarding environment. You’ll be joining a team that values collaboration, innovation, and making a difference in patients’ lives.
   

  

 Locations
   

  

 Multiple locations in Europe
   

  

* Hybrid or Remote

title: Thesis Work: Industrial communication for embedded devices based on OPC UA FX
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun - leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation - for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.


This Position reports to:


R&D Team Lead  

OPC UA Field eXchange (OPC UA FX) is envisaged for industrial communication from cloud to controllers and field devices. It caters for a plethora of use cases by also defining a rich set of data models. However, there is a stance in some industries that many OPC UA FX options make it too “resource-heavy”.


This thesis is to critically assess how far OPC UA FX is now from being utilized in resource-constrained embedded devices/microcontrollers.

**Details**

* Period: January/February – June/July, 2026, 5 months
* Number of credits: 30 ECTS
* Number of students for this thesis work: 2
* Location: On-site, ABB Corporate Research (Västerås)

**Your role and responsibilities**

* Study communication architecture and data models of the OPC UA FX specification
* Review conformity of existing OPC UA implementations to that specification
* Run a selected OPC UA implementation for case-study embedded devices/microcontrollers

**Research questions:**


How “resource-demanding” is OPC UA FX? What are response times of its communication services in microcontrollers?**Approach:**

* Analyze OPC UA implementations, also given their suitability to run under embedded operating systems
* Configure different OPC UA FX communication services in microcontrollers
* Define methodology for evaluating computing and communication performance of OPC UA FX
* Measure the performance and associated resource needs in testbed with microcontrollers
 **Qualifications for the role**

* General understanding of communication architectures and paradigms
* Previous experience of working with embedded devices and associated operating systems
* Good software development skills, proficiency in C or C++ is advantageous
* Good spoken and written English

**More about us**

Supervisor Ognjen Dobrijevic, ognjen.dobrijevic@se.abb.com, will answer all your questions about the thesis topic and expectations. Recruiting Manager Linus Thrybom, +46 73 0809906, will answer your other questions.


Positions are filled continuously. Please apply with your CV, academic transcripts, and a cover letter in English. We look forward to receiving your application!


Join us. Be part of the team where progress happens, industries transform, and your work shapes the world. Run What Runs the World.


A Future Opportunity  

Please note that this position is part of our talent pipeline and not an active job opening at this time. By applying, you express your interest in future career opportunities with ABB.


We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to learn more about us and see the impact of our work across the globe.

title: Data Center Site Manager - Stockholm
description:
CoreWeave is the AI Hyperscaler™, delivering a cloud platform of cutting edge services powering the next wave of AI. Our technology provides enterprises and leading AI labs with the most performant, efficient and resilient solutions for accelerated computing. Since 2017, CoreWeave has operated a growing footprint of data centers covering every region of the US and across Europe. CoreWeave was ranked as one of the TIME100 most influential companies of 2024.



As the leader in the industry, we thrive in an environment where adaptability and resilience are key. Our culture offers career-defining opportunities for those who excel amid change and challenge. If you're someone who thrives in a dynamic environment, enjoys solving complex problems, and is eager to make a significant impact, CoreWeave is the place for you. Join us, and be part of a team solving some of the most exciting challenges in the industry.



CoreWeave powers the creation and delivery of the intelligence that drives innovation.


CoreWeave is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Center Site Manager to join our team in Stockholm. As a Site Manager, you will play a critical role in overseeing the operations and maintenance of our data centre infrastructure. This position involves hardware and network diagnostics followed by physical repair and may include participation in an on-call rotation.


**Location: This is a 100% onsite position in Stockholm, Sweden**  

**Salary:** 808,000 SEK - 950,000 SEK per year. Relocation allowance is available for national and international candidates.


**Responsibilities:**


* Lead a team of data centre technicians in daily operations, including server maintenance, equipment installation, and troubleshooting.
* Develop and implement best practices for data centre operations to ensure maximum efficiency and uptime.
* Coordinate with cross-functional teams to support client projects and ensure seamless service delivery.
* Perform regular inspections and audits of data centre equipment to maintain optimal performance and reliability.
* Respond promptly and resolve technical issues and emergencies, ensuring minimal downtime and disruption.
* Liaise closely with the Data Centre Manager and keep informed of all operational activities, proactively identifying and addressing any issues or concerns that may arise.
* Provide the Data Centre Manager with a weekly synopsis covering successes, issues, and challenges.
* Collaborate with management to develop and execute strategic initiatives to improve data centre performance and scalability.
* Manage the Data Centre Technician shift rota and on-call pattern.
* Hold monthly one-on-ones with each Data Centre Technician.
* Ensure the Data Centre Technician's Tools and Equipment (including PPE) are in good working order.
* Review both installation and removal of equipment from the data centre to ensure that standards are upheld and maintained.
* Train and mentor junior technicians to enhance their skills and knowledge of data centre operations.


**Required experience:**


* 5+ years of experience in data centre operations, with at least 2 years in a leadership or supervisory role.
* In-depth knowledge of data centre infrastructure, including servers, networking equipment, and cooling systems.
* Computer hardware, including troubleshooting and repair skills experience
* Computer networking experience
* Experience with data centre management tools and software
* Ability to work in an environment that operates a shift pattern, with an ability to provide after-hours support as needed
* Candidates should be able to lift up to 22kg and/or work in elevated locations

### **Skills/Qualifications:**



Hands-on OR educational experience with any of the following areas:


* Linux operating system
* Python, Bash or other scripting languages experience
* Experience with Cisco IOS and/or Juniper JunOS
* Certifications such as CompTIA Server+, Network+, or equivalent are a plus.

title: Territory Sales Manager (Mid-Market)
description:
**About Netskope**
==================



Today, there's more data and users outside the enterprise than inside, causing the network perimeter as we know it to dissolve. We realized a new perimeter was needed, one that is built in the cloud and follows and protects data wherever it goes, so we started Netskope to redefine Cloud, Network and Data Security.



Since 2012, we have built the market-leading cloud security company and an award-winning culture powered by hundreds of employees spread across offices in Santa Clara, St. Louis, Bangalore, London, Paris, Melbourne, Taipei, and Tokyo. Our core values are openness, honesty, and transparency, and we purposely developed our open desk layouts and large meeting spaces to support and promote partnerships, collaboration, and teamwork. From catered lunches and office celebrations to employee recognition events and social professional groups such as the Awesome Women of Netskope (AWON), we strive to keep work fun, supportive and interactive. Visit us at Netskope Careers. Please follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter@Netskope.

  


**About the position:**

The **Territory Sales Manager** (Mid-Market) will acquire new customers and sell additional use cases, products and services into existing accounts. Ultimately, the TSM is accountable for exceeding monthly/quarterly quota, proactive deal management, forecast accuracy, and driving adoption/usage with customers and prospects in collaboration with internal teams and the broader Netskope partner ecosystem. This is an amazing opportunity for the sales professional who has a history of completely dominating their territory and who wants to make an impact on building the next iconic cloud security company.


### **Responsibilities include:**


* Prospect new accounts, perform your own lead generation, qualify, develop and close new business.
* Develop an overall account strategy leading to the deployment of a well-executed selling effort into the assigned territory/accounts.
* Sell new accounts, customer satisfaction, and retention of Netskope solutions and services
* Overachieve on sales targets by developing pipeline along with a high level of forecast accuracy
* Sell through channel partners to qualify opportunities

### **Job Requirements:**


* Experience of direct sales experience in a quota-carrying role
* Experience selling cybersecurity software and/or SaaS solutions preferred
* Verifiable track record of exceeding quotas year after year
* Understanding of enterprise web technologies and SaaS experience a must
* Success working with channel partners
* Ability to present and sell by phone / web-demo.
* Highly motivated self-starters, eager to learn, determined to adapt quickly, and comfortable with some ambiguity
* Expert with Salesforce.com

### **Education:**


* Bachelor Degree preferred.


#LI-AP1


Netskope is committed to implementing equal employment opportunities for all employees and applicants for employment. Netskope does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices based on religion, race, color, sex, marital or veteran statues, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, genetic information, pregnancy (including childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), or any other characteristic protected by the laws or regulations of any jurisdiction in which we operate.



Netskope respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal information you share with us, please refer to Netskope's Privacy Policy for more details.

Compute Technical Architect Presales  


This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  

Are you into technical IT solutions that drives business value? We’re looking for a **Compute Technical Architect Presales** with a high technical interest and strong focus on quality to join our growing team.


In this role, you’ll work closely with both internal Sales teams and external Partners to translate business needs into technical solutions within the HPE Server portfolio.


You will act as the technical expert on classic compute, as-a-service (aaS) models and AI as well as various software’s, both HPE own and third party.


As the HPE innovating portfolio is under constant development with new technologies, it shall be natural for you to be curious and want to learn new things.

**Your responsibilities:**

* Technical Architect for HPE Server solutions - building solutions to bring customer business outcomes
* Translate your product knowledge into customer's added business value
* Support the Sales teams by providing technical expertise to customers through presentations and demonstrations
* Design and deliver solutions aligned to customer's business requirements, leveraging knowledge of the industry and the customer's technical environment
* Communicate how the solution value propositions address customer business needs
* Challenge customers status quo by focusing on the business outcomes while position HPE Compute / Server solution portfolio as an element of their hybrid cloud and digitization strategy
* Together with Sales, proactively build the pipeline by identifying opportunities within the account and participates in the account's business planning processes
* Build a trust and strong professional relationships with customers and partners

**About you:**

* Technical experience with IT solutions, preferably within Compute / Servers
* Technical skills, right Attitude and relevant Education
* Interest in Sales, with the aim to bring business values to customers
* Good at partnering, innovating and making things happen
* Ability in driving business relationships and building trust
* Strong solution mindset and with interest to follow market trends
* Capable of learning and acting in limited time constraints
* Ability to prioritize tasks in effective order
* Team player with ability to work independently
* Good communication skills, including active listening and storytelling
* Native fluent level of Swedish. Strong verbal and written communication skills in English**.**

**Education and Experience:**

* 4–6 years of technical experience in IT with a focus on technical solution selling
* First-level university technical degree or equivalent technical qualifications. Advanced degree in technology preferred.

**Beneficials:**

* Previously working with HPE products / portfolio
* Relevant industry certifications

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health & Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal & Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Unconditional Inclusion**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Who we are is what we do.**


Deel is the all-in-one payroll and HR platform for global teams. Our vision is to unlock global opportunity for every person, team, and business. Built for the way the world works today, Deel combines HRIS, payroll, compliance, benefits, performance, and equipment management into one seamless platform. With AI-powered tools and a fully owned payroll infrastructure, Deel supports every worker type in 150+ countries—helping businesses scale smarter, faster, and more compliantly.


Among the largest globally distributed companies in the world, our team of 6,000 spans more than 100 countries, speaks 74 languages, and brings a connected and dynamic culture that drives continuous learning and innovation for our customers.

**Why should you be part of our success story?**


As the fastest-growing Software as a Service (SaaS) company in history, Deel is transforming how global talent connects with world-class companies – breaking down borders that have traditionally limited both hiring and career opportunities. We're not just building software; we're creating the infrastructure for the future of work, enabling a more diverse and inclusive global economy. In 2024 alone, we paid $11.2 billion to workers in nearly 100 currencies and provided healthcare and benefits to workers in 109 countries—ensuring people get paid and protected, no matter where they are.


Our momentum is reflected in our achievements and customer satisfaction: CNBC Disruptor 50, Forbes Cloud 100, Deloitte Fast 500, and repeated recognition on Y Combinator’s top companies list – all while maintaining a 4.83 average rating from 15,000 reviews across G2, Trustpilot, Captera, Apple and Google.


Your experience at Deel will be a career accelerator. At the forefront of the global work revolution, you'll tackle complex challenges that impact millions of people's working lives. With our momentum—backed by a $12 billion valuation and $1 B in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in just over five years—you'll drive meaningful impact while building expertise that makes you a sought-after leader in the transformation of global work.

**Get ready to:**

* Be a part of a truly cross-functional team; Backend Engineers, Frontend Engineers, Product Teams, Designers and QA’s.
* Participate in product planning (From discovery all the way to deployment); We want your input at all stages of the Software Development Lifecycle!
* Collaborate! Our teams work together to develop robust new features, API’s, continuously improve our industry-leading products and find and fix any bugs at DeelSpeed.
* Ensure our customers receive a white-glove experience with our products!
* Fully own the development of features on the client, server, service, and database

 **The bits and bytes that you’ll bring to your new team:**

* You will develop high-quality, responsive web applications using TypeScript, Javascript, React, Express. Experience with NestJS, Vite, and Next.js is a plus.
* You will design and implement server-side APIs, data models, and business logic using mainly Express framework
* You will create client-side function-based React components, hooks, stories, and tests to interact with your server-side work
* You will create and optimize database schemas, queries, and interactions with Postgres.
* You will build reusable and modular components on both the front and back end that promote code reusability, maintainability, and scalability.
* You will perform thorough testing, debugging, and troubleshooting of applications to ensure high-quality deliverables.
* You will stay updated with emerging web development trends, frameworks, and best practices, and recommend improvements to enhance development processes.
* You will participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality standards.
* You will communicate project progress, challenges, and solutions effectively to team members and stakeholders.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes, methodologies, and tools.  

**You're the Engineer we're looking for if you:**
* At least 4 years of Full-Stack experience, with a focus on TypeScript development.
* Expert in the art of designing, coding, testing, and maintaining applications using the tech listed above.
* Thrive in a collaborative, remote-first work culture where teamwork and camaraderie are key.
* Embrace independence and take ownership of your projects, yet also excel in a team setting and love to contribute.
* Communicate complex ideas with ease and enjoy collaborating with diverse teams of technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Are passionate about solving customer problems with your coding superpowers, and are a natural at troubleshooting issues.
* Take a business-focused approach to software development, with a keen eye on delivering high-value outcomes for our clients.
* Obsess over details, and always keep the customer experience top of mind.

**Extra brownie points if you:**

* Have experience with SaaS products running 24/7 on a major cloud vendor.
* Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and asynchronous programming.
* Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha, Chai, Storybook, React Testing Library) and automated testing methodologies (Cypress).
* Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)

**Total Rewards**


Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.

**Some things you’ll enjoy**

* Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
* Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
* The flexibility of remote work, including optional WeWork access


At Deel, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

*Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @**deel.com* *and other acquired company emails like @**payspace.com* *and @**paygroup.com**. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting**our careers page**.*  

  

*Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.*  

  

*Deel will provide accommodation on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodation, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team at recruiting@deel.com of the nature of the accommodation that you may require, to ensure your equal participation.*

**Job Description (Posting).**

**About HCLTech**  

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.  

Our purpose is to bring together the best of technology and our people to supercharge progress for everyone, everywhere our clients, partners, their stakeholders, communities, and the planet. As a company, we are deeply focused on accelerating our ESG agenda. We are also creating technology-enabled sustainable solutions with and for our clients and partners. We embed ESG imperatives into every aspect of our business and ensure that the progress we supercharge is responsible, inclusive and beneficial to all our stakeholders in the long term. We have committed to achieving net zero by 2040.  

  

To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit www.hcltech.com  

  

**Senior Group Technical Architect with .net,c#,C++**  

  

**Job Summary**  

The Senior Group Technical Architect will be responsible for overseeing the technical architecture and design aspects of projects related to .net, c#, and c++. They will play a key role in developing technical solutions to meet business requirements and provide guidance to development teams. (1.) **Key Responsibilities**  

1. Lead and participate in the design and development of software applications using .net, c#, and c++ technologies.  

2. Define technical requirements and create architectural designs to ensure scalability, performance, and reliability.  

3. Collaborate with cross functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions within defined timelines.  

4. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members.  

5. Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.  

6. Identify technical risks and recommend appropriate mitigation strategies.  

7. Stay updated on emerging technologies and trends in the .net, c#, and c++ space.  

  

**Skill Requirements**  

1. Proficiency in .net framework, c#, and c++ programming languages.  

2. Strong experience in software architecture, design patterns, and implementation.  

3. Solid understanding of web development technologies such as asp.net, mvc, and web api.  

4. Knowledge of database systems like sql server, mysql, or oracle.  

5. Good communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team environment.  

6. Problem-solving and analytical skills to address complex technical challenges.  

  

Certifications: Relevant certifications in .NET, C#, or C++ are a plus.

title: Marknadskoordinator
description:
Ronneby Brunn
  
**Plats:** Ronneby Brunn, Ronneby
  
**Tjänst:** Heltid
  
Är du en kreativ marknadsförare med energi, kommersiell blick och förmåga att leda kunder att köpa rätt produkt, vid rätt tillfälle och till rätt pris?
  
Vill du bli en nyckelperson i att stärka Ronneby Brunns varumärke och driva gästupplevelser genom smart kommunikation och visuellt tilltalande marknadsföring?
  
Då är det dig vi söker!
  
DINA HUVUDANSVAR
  
Som Marketing Coordinator har du det övergripande ansvaret för att vårda, utveckla och driva Ronneby Brunns marknadsföring — både digitalt och fysiskt. Du är spindeln i nätet mellan ledning, försäljning, byråer och leverantörer.
  
  

**Du kommer att:**  

Ansvara för uppdatering av hemsida, bokningsplattform och intern infoplattform.
  
Koordinera och producera annonser och kampanjmaterial för både digitala och tryckta kanaler.
  
Ansvara för skärmar, vepor och annan visuell kommunikation på området.
  
Skapa och publicera inlägg och stories i sociala medier
  
Skriva nyhetsbrev och kampanjutskick till gäster och samarbetspartners.
  
Koordinera trycksaker och material med externa leverantörer.
  
Uppdatera tredjepartskanaler med aktuellt innehåll.
  
Säkerställa att allt tryckt material på hotellet är aktuellt och uppdaterat.
  
Driva på merförsäljning genom paketeringar, kampanjer och smart innehåll.
  
Planera och följa upp marknadsaktiviteter i enlighet med marknadsbudget och KPI: er.
  
Samarbeta med externa byråer kring betald annonsering
  
Ansvara för protokollföring och rapporter kopplade till marknadsaktiviteter.
  
  

DU HAR
  
Goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud.
  
Erfarenhet av CMS-system.
  
Grundläggande förståelse för SEO och Google Analytics.
  
Erfarenhet av organisk och betald marknadsföring i sociala medier.
  
Förmåga att självständigt skapa visuellt material och copy.
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
  
Förmåga att planera, schemalägga och analysera kampanjer via verktyg som Meta Business Suite, Canva, Mailchimp, Google Ads Manager etc.
  
Goda kunskapar inom projektledning, kunna prioritera din egna tid och ha god kommunikation med leverantörer, partners och kunder.
  
  

MERITERANDE
  
Erfarenhet av foto, film och enklare videoredigering.
  
Förståelse för gästresan och säsongsanpassad kommunikation.
  
Erfarenhet från hotell-, turism- eller eventbranschen.
  
Erfarenhet av PR, influencer-samarbeten och varumärkesbyggande aktiviteter.
  
Erfarenhet av internkommunikation och employer branding.
  
Erfarenhet av att jobba i Visbook och Book Visit.
  
  

VI ERBJUDER
  
En omväxlande och kreativ roll i hjärtat av en ikonisk hotell- och konferensanläggning.
  
Möjlighet att påverka och utveckla Ronneby Brunns marknadsstrategi.
  
En arbetsmiljö med högt tempo, glada kollegor och stort utrymme för initiativ.
  
  

PERSONLIGA EGENSKAPER
  
Självgående, strukturerad och initiativrik.
  
En idéspruta som gärna tar projekt från start till mål.
  
Noggrann och har öga för detaljer och varumärkesprofil.
  
En lagspelare med känsla för service och kommunikation.
  
  

Vill du vara med och skapa nästa steg i Ronneby Brunns utveckling?
  
Skicka in din ansökan med CV och personligt brev till henrik.svensson@ronnebybrunn.se märkt "I´m the one"

title: Senior Workplace Specialist – Digital Workplace
description:
Vill du vara den som sätter riktningen för hur klientplattformen på Tre ska fungera? Vi söker nu en Senior Workplace Specialist till vårt team Digital Workplace - en nyckelroll där du tar helhetsansvaret för vår Windows- och macOS-miljö och driver utvecklingen framåt.
  
  

Om rollen
  
Som specialist i Digital Workplace blir du den som leder vägen tekniskt inom klientområdet. Du ansvarar för design, drift och vidareutveckling av vår klientplattform för över 2000 användare i Sverige och Danmark. I teamet finns sju engagerade kollegor, men inom just klientområdet kommer du att vara vår främsta expert och kunskapsbärare.
  
  

Du arbetar med allt från image- och livscykelhantering av operativsystem till applikationspaketering, distribution och automatisering. Du säkerställer att våra Windows- och Mac-klienter är uppdaterade, säkra och följer våra interna policys. I rollen ingår att bygga, testa och förbättra klientlösningar, utveckla processer för effektiv hantering samt att driva förbättringar kopplade till både drift och säkerhet. Du samarbetar tätt med vårt säkerhetsteam för att säkerställa regelefterlevnad och dokumenterar kontinuerligt processer och lösningar för att skapa struktur och stabilitet i vår miljö.
  
  

Du kan se fram emot att
  
  

vara en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av Tres digitala arbetsplats
  
arbeta med modern teknik och driva utvecklingen av vår klientplattform
  
vara en del av att leverera kritisk infrastruktur och bidra direkt till samhällsnyttan
  
vara en del av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place To Work samt att vi är stolt samarbetspartner till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar
  
Några av våra medarbetare
  
Julia Maxén
  
Gruppchef
  
"Jag vill att mitt team ska få de bästa förutsättningarna för att göra sitt jobb på bästa sätt. Det är så vi utvecklar oss som team, men även utvecklar Tre framåt."
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital projektledare
  
"Det absolut bästa med att vara projektledare på Tre är jag får jobba brett med kollegor från alla delar av organisationen och få lära mig nya saker varje dag. Jag har friheten att vara mig själv – och bli uppskattad för det!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Utvecklare
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Vem är du?
  
  

Du är en erfaren tekniker eller specialist inom Workplace/Endpoint Management och trivs i en miljö där du får stort eget ansvar och mandat att påverka. Du arbetar strukturerat och proaktivt, och du brinner för att hitta smarta och skalbara lösningar. Som person är du nyfiken, noggrann och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap till andra.
  
  

Du har flera års erfarenhet av att administrera och drifta större Windows- och Mac-miljöer, där du byggt upp en djup kompetens inom MECM och Intune, inklusive områden som Autopilot, MDM och compliance policies. Du har god förståelse för hur man designar, paketerar och distribuerar klienter och applikationer, och har arbetat med image-hantering, OS-deployment samt task sequences för att effektivisera utrullningar och uppdateringar.
  
  

Vi tror att du är van att arbeta med Active Directory, Azure AD och integrationer mellan olika plattformar, och du trivs i en miljö där struktur, dokumentation och säkerhet är centrala delar av arbetet. För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en stark problemlösningsförmåga och ett genuint intresse för att utveckla och förbättra både processer och tekniska lösningar.
  
  

Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av PowerShell och skriptning för automatisering, Jamf eller andra MDM-lösningar för Mac, samt har drivit eller deltagit i större migrerings- eller utrullningsprojekt. Certifieringar inom Microsoft Endpoint eller liknande områden är också en fördel. Du är bekväm med att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vi tar emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du bifogar CV och svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker. Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar i samband med urval. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Bakgrundskontroll görs på slutkandidat.
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Friskvårdsbidrag, föräldrarlön, pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
  
  

Flexibla helgdagar och fem dagar extra ledigt per år
  
  

Hundzon & gym i 3huset
  
  

Subventionerad lunch
  
  

Förmånliga rabatter på cyklar, kollektivtrafik och elbilar
  
  

Generösa bonusmodeller eller provisioner
  
  

Vi drivs av att hela tiden försöka göra saker bättre, på nya och annorlunda sätt. Vi ser oss själva som en avgörande del av Sveriges samhällsstruktur, eftersom vi vet att pålitlig uppkoppling är en viktig grundsten i dagens digitala värld.
  
  

Tre föddes som utmanare och är en organisation i ständig rörelse. Vi strävar efter att vara i framkant i allt vi gör. Vi är övertygade om att det är människorna och kulturen på Tre som är avgörande för vår utveckling.
  
  

När du startar din resa på Tre finns det oändliga möjligheter att växa och utvecklas med oss.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - I en föränderlig värld, är vi på Tre nyfikna och ständigt öppna för nya lösningar. På Tre anpassar vi vägen framåt allt eftersom vi provar och lär oss vad som funkar bäst.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - På Tre gör vi alltid vårt bästa. Vi känner ägandeskap för vår uppgift, sätter tydliga mål och håller fokus på det som gör mest nytta för affären.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - På Tre är vi schyssta kollegor. Vi samarbetar med varandra över team och funktioner, vi bollar idéer, ger och tar emot feedback.
  
  

2003
  
Tre först i Sverige med videosamtal och strömning av mobil video. Att se personen som du ringer upp i ögonen är en helt ny upplevelse vid den här tidpunkten.
  
  

2006
  
Tre lanserar mobilt bredband som tredje operatör i världen. Under de kommande fem åren vinner Tre pris för Sveriges snabbaste mobila bredband.
  
  

2013
  
Tre’s systerbolag Hallon startas med en vision att vara den enkla mobiloperatören utan onödigt krångel.
  
  

2019
  
Ett händelserikt år! 3Världen lanseras som innebär att kunder kan surfa i 80 länder till samma pris som inom Sverige. Därefter lanseras 3Samla som gör att alla kunder kan lägga till fler användare till sitt abonnemang och sist men inte minst är Tre först i Sverige med ett lansera ett publikt 5G-nät.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena byter från 1 januari namn till 3Arena. Med vår starka passion för innovation, uppkoppling och upplevelser ska vi medverka till arenans och områdets utveckling.

title: Specialistsäljare inom Datacenter, Nätverk & Cloud
description:
Vill du vara med på Ateas tillväxtresa inom Hybrid Platforms? Gillar du även att bygga och skapa långsiktiga relationer tillsammans med dina kunder? Då har du hittat rätt utmaning! Just nu söker vi på Atea Region Mitt dig som vill jobba som Specialistsäljare med fokus på Datacenter, Nätverk & Cloud och bli en del av vårt regionala team! Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som präglas av medarbetare som brinner för att bygga Sverige med it, medarbetare som tar personligt ansvar och sätter laget före jaget.


**Din roll**
------------



Vi söker dig som vill arbeta med försäljning av Ateas erbjudanden inom områdena Hybrid Cloud, Server/lagring och Nätverk till våra viktigaste kunder inom både inom privat och offentlig sektor. I rollen som Specialistsäljare bearbetar du nya och utvecklar befintliga kunder genom samarbete i interna kundteam och med våra strategiska partners. Till din hjälp har du ett av IT-branschens starkaste varumärken, ett säljteam med kollegor som sätter laget för jaget och en vältrimmad leveransorganisation. Du kommer att arbeta i kundteam, driva försäljning och ansvara för affärsrelationen inom ditt område. Du kommer arbeta proaktivt för att alltid säkerställa den bästa lösningen för kunden i nära samarbete med våra lösningsarkitekter, konsulter och våra strategiska leverantörer. Du kommer arbeta med att tolka kundbehov, tillsammans med lösningsarkitekt m fl omvandla behov till lösningsförslag, framtagande av anbud och förhandling.



Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:


* Ansvara för försäljningen av hela vårt erbjudande inom området Hybrid Platforms
* Samarbeta och skapa lösningsförslag med kollegor i kundteam, tillverkare och andra partners
* Träffa kund fysiskt och digitalt över våra nio platskontor i region mitt
* Skapa och utveckla affärsmöjligheter utifrån kundens vision, verksamhetsnytta och rådande konkurrenssituation
* Säkerställa hög kundnöjdhet genom träffsäkerhet i vårt erbjudande och snabb, kvalitativ återkoppling på kundens förfrågningar.
* Skapa och etablera långsiktiga relationer med nyckelpersoner hos kunden, samt Ateas strategiska partners inom området
* Arbeta för att nå uppsatta försäljningsmål och nyckeltal

**Vem är du?**
--------------



Vi tror på dig och dina personliga egenskaper, vilka är viktiga för att du ska lyckas i rollen och trivas hos oss. I din roll som specialistsäljare ser vi att du är en person som är självgående och har ett affärssinne för att hitta nya affärer och trivs med att ta dialoger med kunder gällande deras behov och anpassar lösningen utifrån önskemålen. Du gillar att se nya kunder och arbeta i en varierande vardag. Att bygga ett stort kontaktnät, både externt och internt med dina kolleger, är en viktig pusselbit för att lyckas med dina affärer. Du har en god kommunikativ förmåga och talar klart och välformulerat i både små och stora grupper. Du är initiativtagande och driven av dig och uppnår de resultat och åtaganden du tar till dig, samt har en nyfikenhet och vilja att lära dig nytt. Du kan samarbeta väl med andra, samt delegera och följa upp kollegors arbete. Slutligen är ditt personliga engagemang avgörande för denna roll. Tillsammans bygger vi en ny affär och vi brinner för det vi gör – söker du en sådan utmaning är detta rätt plats för dig!



För att lyckas i rollen behöver du följande:


* Arbetar som Account Manager i IT-branschen eller som lösningsarkitekt/specialistsäljare inom Datacenter/Nätverk.
* Vara flexibel och kunna ta sig ut till kund fysiskt för både dagsresor samt övernattningsresor
* Kunna uttrycka dig väl i både tal och skrift på svenska och engelska
* Innehar B-körkort


Det anses vara meriterande om du har:


* Arbetat som Account Manager, Key Account Manager eller Specialistsäljare inom Hybrid Platforms

**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Mattias Lindell, Regional Försäljningschef, via mattias.lindell@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!



Nästa steg i processen består av ett kortare telefonsamtal där dina erfarenheter & kompetenser stäms av, du får även höra mer om tjänsten och ställa dina eventuella frågor.



Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.



Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.



Den här rekryteringen hanteras av oss på Atea och vi undanber oss därför samtal och mail från rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag



Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss!

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Postdoc position in Resilient Edge Computing and Networking
description:
At the department, education is conducted in the subjects of computer engineering, electronics, electrical engineering and sound production. The research at the department takes place at the research center Sensible Things that Communicate (www.miun.se/stc) and deals with sensor-based systems and services for use within the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence.

**Job description**  

The postdoctoral researcher will work within the project ResilientEdge, a collaborative initiative between Mid Sweden University and the University of Oulu, Finland. This project focuses on advancing research in resilient infrastructure and services in a world with insecure and unstable Internet connectivity. The responsibilities include conducting research and developing solutions for future resilient networks and resilient distributed services, including evaluating vulnerabilities and implementing protection mechanisms against threats in heterogeneous Cloud/Fog/Mist/Edge environments, as well as aiding enterprises in their process of employing these technologies.


The postdoctoral researcher will work with advanced methods to analyze, identify, and improve resilience of next generation networks. Including requirements capturing from SME partners, developing resilient scalable edge platform architectures, implementing AI for resilient infrastructure, resilient distributed inference, and hyperlocal computations with tiny edge AI.


In this work, the postdoctoral researcher will also collaborate with a multidisciplinary research team, participate in research projects, and publish results in international journals and conferences. The research for this position will be carried out at the Communication Systems and Networking research group at the STC research centre, in close collaboration with international academy and industrial partners. Collaboration with industry partners and research institutes is therefore an important part of the work, and teaching opportunities may be available depending on the scope of the project.

 **Requirement**  

To be eligible for a post-doctoral appointment, your qualifications must match the requirements described in Mid Sweden University’s employment procedures.


The candidate must hold a PhD degree, or equivalent, in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Electrical Engineering. The PhD degree must have been completed no longer than three years prior to the closing date of the application.

 **Assessment**  

The candidate is required to have demonstrated expertise and a proven research track record in fault-tolerant distributed system design, including deep expertise in federated learning using TensorFlow and Flower. You must also have practical experience implementing Cloud-Native Edge Computing with specific knowledge on deploying Kubernetes and microservices at the Edge. We also require a strong background in network security, including hands-on experience with Secure Multi-Party Computation (SMPC) or Differential Privacy in a distributed context. A proven ability to write high-quality code in Python for distributed applications and the ability to work with IoT devices such as the Raspberry Pi is also essential.


Previous experience of the following topics is meritorious: The Cloud/Fog/Edge continuum, resilient edge infrastructure, resilient edge AI services, AI-enhanced infrastructure resilience, hyperlocal/tiny edge AI, distributed task offloading, network resource management, 5G/6G networks, and industrial IoT networks.

 **Personal qualities**  

The position requires strong collaboration skills and flexibility, as well as the ability to work both independently and as a part of a team. The applicant is required to have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication skills in English, both spoken and written. Additional desirable qualities are curiosity, creative thinking, being inventive, taking own initiatives, and being goal oriented.

 **Other assessment criteria**  

The applicant should be able to communicate research findings to both academic and non-academic audiences. Experience working in international research environments is considered a merit. Other assessment criteria also include quality of published scientific articles, larger software projects, and other activities relevant for the position.

 **Employment process**  

Processing of the appointment will be in accordance with Mid Sweden University’s Employment Procedures.

 **Terms of employment**  

This is a full-time position (100%) for 2 years from 1st of January 2026 or as agreed. The position mainly contains time for research; teaching may amount to no more than 20% of the working hours.


Terms and conditions of employment are set out in the Fixed-term employment contract for post-doctoral appointments.

 **Place of employment:** Sundsvall

 **Information**  

For more detailed information contact the Head of department, Assoc. Prof. Patrik Österberg, patrik.osterberg@miun.se, or Project leader Assoc. Prof. Stefan Forsström, stefan.forsstrom@miun.se.

 **Application**  

Documents to be appended to the application:

* Cover letter (max. 1 page)
* Curriculum vitae
* Statement of research interests (max. 1 page)
* List of publications
* Copies of official transcripts and degree certificates (PhD+MSc+BSc), and their English translations (Swedish certificates are accepted), and Diploma Supplement
* Links to PhD and MSc theses
* Links to at most 5 publications that the candidate wants to emphasize
* Contact details of two referees
* Other documents the applicant would like to refer to


Application documents must be submitted in English or Swedish.


Please send in your application through recruitment system **by no later than 2025-11-04.**


Mid Sweden University has two campuses; in Sundsvall and in Östersund, both located close to students, colleagues and the surrounding society. At the same time, it is located conveniently close to the sea, forests and mountains, which provides a great quality of life. Here, new knowledge is created by means of internationally successful research and education that contribute to the development of our society. This way, we actively contribute to a sustainable future and a better world. Mid Sweden University works actively for equal opportunities and strives to embrace the qualities that diversity and equality bring to the organization. Prior to any recruitment work, Mid Sweden University has taken a position on consulting support, recruitment channels and marketing. We therefore kindly ask media vendors, recruitment sites and the like not to contact us.

title: Erfaren Salesforce specialist
description:
Vill du kombinera din Salesforce-expertis med programmering och skapa lösningar som gör skillnad? Hos oss får du arbeta med de senaste Salesforce-produkterna och utveckla integrationer som driver affären framåt!


Som Salesforce-specialist hos SPP kommer du att arbeta med flera olika delar av Salesforce-plattformen, inklusive Financial Service Cloud (FSC), Marketing Cloud och Data Cloud (CDP). Du blir en medlem i vårt fantastiska utvecklingsteam, där vår drivkraft är affärsvärdet och att lyckas som ett team!


Vi är ett team med stort ansvar för allt som rör Salesforce på SPP. Detta innebär att vi alltid har fokus på att skapa konkret värde och sprida kunskap inom teamet.

**Om dig**


För att vara framgångsrik och kunna bidra till teamet ser vi att du framför allt är nyfiken och en lagspelare. Du kommer dels arbeta direkt i Salesforce, men också med integrationer och kopplingar till andra system.


Du är öppen för att lära dig alla delar inom Salesforce-plattformen som kommer att vara relevanta för SPP, och du har:

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet inom Salesforce
* Erfarenhet av programmering i Java eller .NET
* Erfarenhet av att förstå, designa och implementera framgångsrika Salesforce-lösningar
* Gedigen teknisk kunskap och förståelse för Salesforce-plattformen och produkterna, t.ex. Sales Cloud, Service Cloud och Marketing Cloud
* Relevanta certifieringar
* Förmåga att samarbeta effektivt med andra, dela med dig av kunskap, erfarenheter och information samt stödja andra i att uppnå gemensamma mål
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Akademisk examen eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet

**Vi erbjuder:**

* En livlig arbetsmiljö i hjärtat av Stockholm.
* En stöttande och samarbetsvillig teamkultur.
* Möjligheter för professionell tillväxt och utveckling.
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmånspaket, inklusive pensions- och försäkringsplaner.

**Varför välja SPP?**


SPP är en del av den nordiska finanskoncernen Storebrand. Tillsammans skapar vi en framtid att glädjas åt genom att vägleda till ekonomiska beslut som gynnar individen, samhället och planeten långsiktigt på ett enkelt sätt. Vi sitter i helt nyrenoverade lokaler precis intill Stockholms centralstation och erbjuder en hybrid arbetsplats.


SPP värdesätter de kvaliteter som jämn könsfördelning och mångfald tillför verksamheten. Vi ser därför gärna sökande av alla kön och med olika födelsebakgrund och livserfarenhet.

**Ansökan**  

I din ansökan ber vi dig bifoga ditt CV, men i stället för ett personligt brev kommer du få svara på några ansökningsfrågor kopplat till tjänsten. Om du har några frågor kring tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen så är du varmt välkommen att kontakta David Backman, Head of Tech Engagement, eller Lovisa Stehn, Rekryteringsansvarig, .


Välkommen in med din ansökan, senast **2 november 2025.**


Kontaktuppgifter till våra lokala fackförbund  

*Mattias Thunström, Finansförbundet, tel 070-864 41 11*  

*Anna Peltovuori, Akademikerföreningen, tel 070-648 17 55*

*Med kandidatens samtycke görs en bakgrundskontroll under anställningsprocessens slutskede som innebär kontroll av personalia, ekonomiska förhållanden och juridiska frågor. Även CV och annan ansökningsdokumentation kan komma att verifieras.*

title: Account Manager (UK)
description:
**About Proxify**

  

Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Stockholm, Proxify helps 2,500+ companies globally scale their tech teams with top-tier talent in Software, Data and AI. When internal demand for tech skills arises, we deliver carefully vetted, tailored developers within 48 hours removing traditional hiring delays so clients can move fast.

  

Recognised by the Financial Times as the 3rd fastest-growing company in Sweden (2025), and a member of the Deloitte Fast 50 Sweden (2024), we’re trusted by startups, scale-ups and global brands like Securitas, Electrolux and Lufthansa.

 **Role overview**

  

As an **Account Manager**, you will manage end-to-end client engagement: discovery, proposal, negotiation, onboarding, retention, and expansion. You will ensure clients derive real value from Proxify’s engineers, build lasting partnerships, and grow your account portfolio.  



  

**Key responsibilities**

* Build and nurture relationships with senior decision-makers; manage a portfolio of SMB clients to drive satisfaction and loyalty.
* Engage regularly with C-level and senior technical stakeholders to shape their tech-resourcing and project strategies.


* Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities as well as negotiating contracts to grow accounts.


* Coordinate with internal talent, engineering, and delivery teams to align resources, timelines, and outcomes with client expectations.


* Monitor account health, report on performance, advise clients on improvements, and manage risks.


* Match developers to client needs using your technical understanding, working with Client Engineering to ensure quality and fit.

 **Must-have**

* 3-5 years managing enterprise or large B2B client accounts; experience in tech services, software, staffing, or outsourcing (UK market preferred).


* Proven **track record of closing deals**, growing revenue, and retaining long-term clients.


* **Credible technical fluency and understanding** gained via hands-on roles (developer, project/product/engineering lead) or working closely with technical teams.


* **Strong negotiation and commercial skills**; comfortable discussing pricing, SLAs, scope, and delivery models with senior stakeholders.


* Ability and willingness to **travel** **1-2 business trips per month** as needed.


* **Advanced English**.


* **Self-starter attitude**; ownership of outcomes, persistence, and ability to manage multiple projects/clients.


* **Experience with CRM**, forecasting and account planning tools.

 **Nice-to-have**

* Experience in staffing, developer sourcing, or tech recruitment.


* Comfortable in distributed team or remote-work environments.


* Knowledge of current tech trends (cloud, AI, frameworks, remote work).


* Familiarity with enterprise contracting, procurement or legal norms.


* Wider professional network across the UK.

  


**Why you will love this opportunity**

  

Help tech teams close skill gaps and create job opportunities for tech talent worldwide.


️ Be part of a humble, supportive, and tech-savvy team.


Spearhead the growth of client partnerships in the UK and Ireland.


Great opportunities for professional development and personal growth.


️ Work in a truly international team of 39 countries, with occasional in-person meetups.

 **Why it may not be your match**

  

You like every day to look the same (clear routines and process), this might not be for you because we build as we go and keep things agile.


You lack any exposure to or understanding of tech and its applications.


You don’t have an English level (advanced or, ideally, native).

 **How to apply**


Please send your CV (in English) explaining:


1. Your experience working with clients (ideally in the UK market).


2. Your technical background working closely with developer and engineering teams


3. Why you find Proxify’s mission attractive and what excites you about this opportunity.
